Rosie, a cheerful seven-year-old with golden blonde wavy hair past her shoulders, rosy cheeks, and bright curious eyes, wearing a red Christmas sweater with white snowflakes, reaches up to place a glowing golden star ornament on a beautifully decorated Christmas tree. Beside her sits Lalo, a medium-small fluffy aussalier with a gorgeous merle coat of swirling grays, blacks, and whites, feathered floppy ears, and warm brown eyes, his plumed tail wagging. The star ornament (Shimmer) glows unusually bright, and has a tiny friendly face that's winking. Tiny glowing frost-fairies (small, delicate, luminescent beings) flit among the branches, leaving trails of sparkle dust. Rosie kneels at the pond's edge, her golden blonde waves falling forward, rosy cheeks flushed from running, green mittens pressed against the ice, looking concerned.
